Articles.Content: I recently found this game and I got hooked right from the start! It's a WWII aircraft combat sim, anybody else play it?
I recently found it on Facebook; have had it for a few days. It's a very finely crafted game, and very fun to play.

I've been wanting to share this, I made it as a request for someone but I made one before this and I love this game alot!

Tell me whatcha' think please!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

There was a thread for this not too long ago, but I think it got lost.

Been playing it on and off for a few months now.

Most used plane is the H6K4.
I think war thunder is my second most played game next to KSP. I'm still not very good at it though.

There was a thread for this not too long ago, but I think it got lost.

Been playing it on and off for a few months now.

Most used plane is the H6K4.

I hate the H6K. Mainly because it's about as durable as the Catalina, but also has four engines and a variety of additional redundancies to boot. I lost two planes attempting to take one out once, all pilot KOs by the gunners.

I hate the H6K. Mainly because it's about as durable as the Catalina, but also has four engines and a variety of additional redundancies to boot. I lost two planes attempting to take one out once, all pilot KOs by the gunners.

Solution:

Supersonic MiG 15s (The speed is in MPH btw)

I've been wanting to share this, I made it as a request for someone but I made one before this and I love this game alot!

Tell me whatcha' think please!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

That's awesome! By the way if you want to be a trolling douche, go for the LaGG 3 or the AirCobra, they're awesome.
